item.title: Grammar Quest -- An Adventure in Proofreading
item.description: Prologue Look, I’m a reasonable guy. Everyone makes mistakes – myself least of all – so I don’t expect anything in life to be perfect. Except, well… I do expect large corporations to do a couple of once-overs on their documents before they push them to the public to ensure that there are no weird linguistic or formatting errors. All I’m asking is for documents presented by any organization larger than, say, ten people, to be utterly perfect.
